snippet: Kevin Reilly, the top executive at Fox broadcast television, is leaving the network next month, the company said on Thursday, after Fox slumped to last place in ratings among the big U.S. broadcasters....

headline.print_headline: Fox TV Network Chief to Depart After Ratings Slump
headline.main: Fox TV Network Chief to Depart After Ratings Slump

lead_paragraph: Kevin Reilly, the top executive at Fox broadcast television, is leaving the network next month, the company said on Thursday, after Fox slumped to last place in ratings among the big U.S. broadcasters.
